analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#624-629):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#627-628)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#629)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#550-578):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#552-556)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#556-561)

	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#569-570)
SafeMathLib.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#22-28) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

BonusFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(teamAddresses[i],allocatedBonus) (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#757-758)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#680-701) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#691-701)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#690-701)

FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#72-74)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x70791b81028f30ff01d4ad8f83cbffcd2be1b1f3.sol#160-162)
